Map Base Tile Provider

This view allows you to define a base tile provider for all the maps throughout the system.

This includes the web portal, iOS and Android SDK's.

For the moment you can only choose from free tile providers but we'll be enabling paid ones later as well.

The mapping feature is still in beta so if you have any issues, please send your feedback to our support at support@proximi.io.
